parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the provided control's style. See <template><title>HashLink</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Arma: GUI Configuration#Control Styles</value></part></template>.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[ctrlStyle]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - see <template><title>HashLink</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Arma: GUI Configuration#Control Styles</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _ctrlStyle = [[ctrlStyle]] _myControl;

[[private]] _bitFlags = _ctrlStyle [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_bitflagsToArray]];
[[if]] (2 [[in]] _bitFlags) [[then]]
{
	[[hint]] "This control has centered text!";
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlType]] [[BIS_fnc_bitflagsToArray]]
</value></part></template></root>
